title: Iman Bowie, 64, looks sensational as she's honoured at the Golden Heart Awards in New York
text:
She is one of the most recognisable supermodels in the world.

And Iman Bowie, 64, looked absolutely phenomenal as she arrived in style to the 13th annual Golden Heart Awards in New York on Monday night.

The Somali-American beauty wowed in a copper-coloured leopard-print suit as she took to the stage to collect the award for Outstanding Community Service.

Icon: Iman Bowie, 64, looked absolutely phenomenal as she arrived in style to the 13th annual Golden Heart Awards in New York on Monday night

Iman showed off her style credentials in her striking blazer which exposed her glittering low-cut bodysuit.

She teamed the look with a pair of high-waisted matching trousers which cinched in her tiny waist and put emphasis on her endlessly long, lean legs.

Iman's caramel-coloured tresses were parted down the middle and hung in elegant curls, showcasing her large gold hoop earrings.

Big night: The Somali-American beauty wowed in a copper-coloured leopard-print suit as she took to the stage to collect the award for Outstanding Community Service

Looking good: Iman showed off her style credentials in her striking blazer which exposed her glittering low-cut bodysuit

Perfection: She teamed the look with a pair of high-waisted matching trousers which cinched in her tiny waist and put emphasis on her long, lean legs - Pictured with Michael Kors

Gorgeous: Iman's caramel-coloured tresses were parted down the middle and hung in elegant curls, showcasing her large gold hoop earrings

Her striking features were enhanced with a glamorous coat of make-up, and the beauty ensured to pop on her glasses as she took to the stage.

Iman was awarded the coveted Michael Kors Award for Outstanding Community Service.

The award ceremony was presented by God's Love We Deliver, a charity organisation that works to provide meals to and end hunger among people living with HIV/AIDS, as well as other serious illnesses.

Meanwhile, earlier this year on April 24, Iman paid tribute to her late husband David on what would have been their 27th wedding anniversary.

Stunning: Her striking features were enhanced with a glamorous coat of make-up

Closer look: The beauty ensured to pop on her glasses as she took to the stage

Honoured: Iman was awarded the coveted Michael Kors Award for Outstanding Community Service

Star: Iman looked in high spirits as she posed alongside Lupita Nyong'o and Ugbad Abdi (R)

Taking to her Instagram page, where she regularly shares inspirational quotes and updates about her life, Iman wrote: 'April 24th Forever Love.#BowieForever.'

The couple married on April 24, 1992 in a private ceremony in Lausanne, Switzerland.

The union was solemnised in Florence, Italy, on June 6 that year. They welcomed their daughter Alexandria, known as Lexi, in 2000.

Bowie died in 2016 aged 69 following a battle with cancer.

After retiring from modelling in 1989, the multi-talented star founded Iman Cosmetics, now a $25 million-a-year business, based on makeup for non-Caucasian women.
